short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily generate a reliable link to a specific email thread in a particular inbox

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click the extension icon to copy the URL of the current Gmail thread to your clipboard. Paste it where you need it -- notes, to-do lists, docs, etc.
